text: Adrian Meikle (born 17 March 1965) is a Welsh curler and member of the Wales Men's Curling Team that takes part in the European Curling Championships. He is also a member of the Welsh Mixed Doubles and Senior Team. He played in one World Curling Championships, in as a second for Wales. He won a gold medal at the 2007 European Mixed Curling Championship as a skip. ==Personal life== He is a son of Hugh Meikle, Welsh curler and one of the founders of Welsh Curling Association. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh male curlers Category:European curling champions
title: Adrian Meikle
